The Facebook Dilemma

Jun 1, 2016
1 minute read

The other day, I read an article on Medium by Mary Pilon, author of a book called The Monopolists. The article was called ‘Instagram Is Ruining Vacation’. Mary uses her Instragram snapshot of a temple in Cambodia (the one I’d seen in Tomb Raider ) to illustrate how people are more interested in capturing perfect pictures of their travels than in enjoying the travelling experience itself.
